issue.title: Signature algorithm x not enabled
issue.body:
I am trying to understand and run the liboqs tests. I have to mention that I have liboqs and the oqs-opensll fork. I have tested the signature and kem examples from the github and I get this output which I find positive.

└─$ ./example_sig                      
[example_stack] OQS_SIG_dilithium_2 operations completed.
[example_heap]  OQS_SIG_dilithium_2 operations completed.

As these examples use dilithium2, I think as they work, the algorithm should be enabled. Anyways, when I try to compile and run test_sig.c, test_sig_mem.c, when executing the resulting executable file, I get this message: 

┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~/task5/liboqs/build/tests]
└─$ ./test_sig_mem 0 Dilithium2
Configuration info
==================
Target platform:  x86_64-Linux-5.16.0-kali7-amd64
Compiler:         gcc (11.3.0)
Compile options:  [-march=native;-Werror;-Wall;-Wextra;-Wpedantic;-Wstrict-prototypes;-Wshadow;-Wformat=2;-Wfloat-equal;-Wwrite-strings;-O3;-fomit-frame-pointer;-fdata-sections;-ffunction-sections;-Wl,--gc-sections;-Wbad-function-cast]
OQS version:      0.7.2-rc1
Git commit:       3cf9849cc43545ad7fdeb3092a90f94ff1881680
OpenSSL enabled:  Yes (OpenSSL 3.0.4 21 Jun 2022)
AES:              NI
SHA-2:            OpenSSL
SHA-3:            C
OQS build flags:  OQS_OPT_TARGET=auto CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release 
CPU exts compile-time:  AES AVX PCLMULQDQ POPCNT SSE SSE2 SSE3

Signature algorithm 0 not enabled!

I have even try to pass as an argv OQS_SIG_alg_dilithium_3, as in the example_sig.c: sig = OQS_SIG_new(OQS_SIG_alg_dilithium_3);

I have seen that there are some flags for cmake command https://github.com/open-quantum-safe/liboqs/wiki/Customizing-liboqs#OQS_ENABLE_KEM_<ALG>/OQS_ENABLE_SIG_<ALG>
The solution would be to install everything from the scratch and mention all the flags at cmake? Is there another way? 
Thank you in advance!

I am trying to understand and run the liboqs tests. I have to mention that I have liboqs and the oqs-opensll fork. I have tested the signature and kem examples from the github and I get this output which I find positive.

issue.title: Error while generating required QSC certificates
issue.body:
Hi, I am getting the following error while generating all required QSC certificates

```
ubuntu@ubuntu:~/oqs-demos/nginx/fulltest$ python3 genconfig.py
. > /tmp/opt/openssl/apps/openssl req -x509 -new -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout root/CA.key -out root/CA.crt -nodes -subj /CN=oqstest_CA -days 500 -config /tmp/opt/openssl/apps/openssl.cnf
New root cert residing in root/CA.crt.
. > /tmp/opt/openssl/apps/openssl ecparam -name prime256v1 -out pki/prime256v1.pem
Can't open pki/prime256v1.pem for writing, No such file or directory
0:error:02001002:system library:fopen:No such file or directory:crypto/bio/bss_file.c:69:fopen('pki/prime256v1.pem','w')
0:error:2006D080:BIO routines:BIO_new_file:no such file:crypto/bio/bss_file.c:76:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "genconfig.py", line 197, in <module>
    main()
  File "genconfig.py", line 193, in main
    gen_cert(sig)
  File "genconfig.py", line 63, in gen_cert
    common.run_subprocess([OPENSSL, "ecparam", "-name", "prime256v1", "-out", os.path.join(PKIPATH, "prime256v1.pem")])
  File "/home/ubuntu/oqs-demos/nginx/fulltest/common.py", line 47, in run_subprocess
    assert False, "Got unexpected return code {}".format(result.returncode)
AssertionError: Got unexpected return code 1
```

issue.title: Error while generating required QSC certificates
issue.body:
Hi, I am getting the following error while generating all required QSC certificates

```
ubuntu@ubuntu:~/oqs-demos/nginx/fulltest$ python3 genconfig.py
. > /tmp/opt/openssl/apps/openssl req -x509 -new -newkey rsa:4096 -keyout root/CA.key -out root/CA.crt -nodes -subj /CN=oqstest_CA -days 500 -config /tmp/opt/openssl/apps/openssl.cnf
New root cert residing in root/CA.crt.
. > /tmp/opt/openssl/apps/openssl ecparam -name prime256v1 -out pki/prime256v1.pem
Can't open pki/prime256v1.pem for writing, No such file or directory
0:error:02001002:system library:fopen:No such file or directory:crypto/bio/bss_file.c:69:fopen('pki/prime256v1.pem','w')
0:error:2006D080:BIO routines:BIO_new_file:no such file:crypto/bio/bss_file.c:76:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "genconfig.py", line 197, in <module>
    main()
  File "genconfig.py", line 193, in main
    gen_cert(sig)
  File "genconfig.py", line 63, in gen_cert
    common.run_subprocess([OPENSSL, "ecparam", "-name", "prime256v1", "-out", os.path.join(PKIPATH, "prime256v1.pem")])
  File "/home/ubuntu/oqs-demos/nginx/fulltest/common.py", line 47, in run_subprocess
    assert False, "Got unexpected return code {}".format(result.returncode)
AssertionError: Got unexpected return code 1
```
